ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisRe-appointment of DAVID HAMILTON of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, to be a temporary member of the National Energy Board for a term ending December 31, 2007, for the purpose of matters related to the Mackenzie Gas Pipeline project, effective October 18, 2006.
